content.text:
It's still September 10th over here, but it looks like this was just published by The New Zealand Herald.


![Comic. Left panel captioned "2001 united" with the statue of liberty holding a torch, right panel captioned "2018 divided" with a white hand holding a tiki torch.](&2mrNXFy4TcoTBPdx7uhv1bu3araFFl+td+pNiIl7638=.sha256)

mentions.name: Comic. Left panel captioned "2001 united" with the statue of liberty holding a torch, right panel captioned "2018 divided" with a white hand holding a tiki torch.
